ChrispyBacon-dev/DockFlare

Automates Cloudflare Tunnel setup for Docker apps with easy web UI

View on index

Related repos

  • Docker image with web interface for Cloudflare tunnels
  • command-line tool for secure Cloudflare Tunnels to your servers
  • Web interface for container management
  • Reverse proxy for Docker and other services with web UI, automation tools, and traffic control
  • self-hosted reverse proxy tunnels for Docker apps using WireGuard, NGINX, and Caddy
  • automates docker container updates with web UI, scheduling, notifications, and per-container control

  • Docker images for Python APIs
